name: Shoot'em Up (Nythen)
description:
This minigame was started as an exercice from a Master degree on Videogames Programming and Virtual Reality.

The game was developed in C# and Unity. 

My highscore is 16250. Did you beat me? Let me know! ^^

Controls W / Top ArrowMove UpS / Bottom ArrowMove DownA / Left ArrowMove LeftD / Right ArrowMove RightLeft Mouse Click / SpacebarFireRight Mouse Click / L. ShiftSpecial Skill
